title: Character Replacement Function
description: This function replaces occurrences of a specified substring (SRC) in a given string (STR) with another substring (REP). It ensures that the lengths of SRC and REP are the same before proceeding with the replacement. If SRC is longer than REP, SRC will be trimmed to match the length of REP, and vice versa. The function then performs the replacement for each character in the original string.
name: REPLACE_CHARS

input.name: STR
input.description: The string in which the replacement will occur.

input.name: SRC
input.description: The substring to be replaced in STR.

input.name: REP
input.description: The substring that will replace occurrences of SRC.

output.name: REPLACE_CHARS
output.description: The resulting string after replacement operations.

return_value.description: The modified string after replacing characters according to the defined rules.
